title: Make the Landing Page “Get Started” button open the provided Google Form

requirements.text: Update the Landing Page hero section “Get Started” button so that tapping/clicking it opens this URL: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfPd7k1jiJqI71faIie9aYOmeScqdQ98jTcIFtYoJK9AJvHig/viewform?usp=preview (open in a new browser tab/window) instead of triggering the Internet Identity login flow.

quotes: Get Started button link to https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfPd7k1jiJqI71faIie9aYOmeScqdQ98jTcIFtYoJK9AJvHig/viewform?usp=preview whenever touch on it

acceptanceCriteria: On the Landing Page hero section, clicking/tapping the button labeled “Get Started” opens https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfPd7k1jiJqI71faIie9aYOmeScqdQ98jTcIFtYoJK9AJvHig/viewform?usp=preview
The Google Form opens in a new tab/window (i.e., does not navigate away from the app tab)
Clicking “Get Started” no longer initiates the Internet Identity login flow or shows the “Loading...” state for that button

constraints: Frontend files under the immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.frontend.immutablePaths must not be modified.
nonGoals: Do not change backend canister logic or authentication behavior outside of the Landing Page “Get Started” button behavior.
Do not change the “Find Jobs” and “Hire Talent” buttons unless explicitly requested.
